tool_description: Information about corona or covid-19 by Articles
name: Corona News
title: Corona News

api_list.name: List All Corona News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back list all Corona news.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://corona-news.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "corona-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Individual Corona News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back Corona News from a spesific news resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://corona-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/kompas"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "corona-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://corona-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newsid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "corona-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
